institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal human resource development support project operation rules/Article 8 (Business plan notice)
contents: Article 8 (Business Plan Announcement) Based on the annual business plan approved by the Minister of Employment and Labor, the Chairman of the Board announces support targets, support requirements, selection criteria, application period, application procedures, etc. for each business at the necessary time through the Internet, broadcasting, newspapers, etc. Announced through
